item.description: Image processing # exercise 1 include the blue channel in the uv visualization. [4] uv.js uv.frag exercise 2 Use other shapes different than the quad as screen filters. [4] uvcopy.js uvcopy.frag exercise 3 Coloring brightness tools [1] [2] luma.js luma.frag En la parte superior de la imagen encontraras unos checkbuttons, al hacer clic en ellos puedes ver la representacion que escojas de la imagen, ya sea luma, hsl, hsv o average.
